name: Perpetual Motion Demo
description:
-PERPETUAL MOTION-

A team of five researchers arrives to a distant planet, intent on uncovering its secrets. Four of them descend to conduct their experiments, and one stays behind.

The researchers underestimated the lethally cold environment of the planet. Only one researcher remains on the ship, stuck in orbit, the vessel's engines frozen as the night slowly catches up with it end to front.

That one remaining researcher is you, Terry. You wake up to the blaring of alarms, the signals from your companions offline. The night is crawling ever closer, its cold claws inching in your direction. Your only chance of survival is the one last remaining Perpetual Motion Pack above the engine room, in the bowels of the ship. Can you find it and make your way off of this deathtrap you woke up on? Can you escape the night?

CONTROLS

A, D to move left and right
Space to jump
Space while mid-air to dash (once you find the Perpetual Motion Pack, of course!)
Tab to reload last checkpoint

BUG ADVISORY

This demo is a very early prototype of the game and there are some devious bugs hiding, biding their time to jump you. Should you find yourself stuck, press TAB to reload the last checkpoint.

THANK YOU

Thank you for playing this demo! We hope you find as much enjoyment in it as we did making it!
